sections.heading: Client, defined.Client means the person or persons who engage a real property appraiser by employment or contract in a specific assignment whether directly or through an agent
sections.text: SourceLaws 2015, LB139, ยง 14;R.S.Supp.,2016, ยง 76-2207.06;Laws 2018, LB741, ยง 11;Laws 2020, LB808, ยง 58.
